articles.description: Exposure to antibiotics in utero and infancy can lead to an irreversible loss of regulatory T-cells in the colon, a valuable component of the immune system's response toward allergens in later life, after only six months, finds a new research.

articles.title: Covid-19 strains don't appear to be highly variable: Expert - ETHealthworld.com
